section.conf_title_desc: Settings for the (e$) bookie System by emoney of fantasyfootballhaven.com.

setting.conf_description: Turn the helpful footers about spreads and odds on the mod/admin pages on?
If set to YES only 1 bet per user will be allowed, including adminds, mods, etc
How many games/bets/losers/winners/etc do you wish to display per page?
Which points sytem do you use? The default system or a pre-existing points system?
setting.conf_extra: ibbookie_points=Built in System (ibBookie) points=iPoints/IBstore/ibMarket/Perfect Points money=IBProBattle utr_points=Ultimate Referrals posts=Post Count

setting.conf_title: Name for points within the component
setting.conf_description: What do you want your ibBookie "points" to be named in the component itself, not in topics?

setting.conf_title: Short name for points within the component
setting.conf_description: What do you want to abbreviate the above points name to within the component itself, not in topics?
Show the total number of points won from ibBookie wagers in topics?
What do you want your ibBookie "points won" to be named in topics?
Show and link to each member's ibBookie bets in topics?
What do you want your ibBookie bets to be named in topics?

setting.conf_title: Show ibBookie system total points in topics?
setting.conf_description: Show member's ibBookie Points in topics? Select NO if you use another points system besides the one built into ibBookie.
What do you want your ibBookie System "points" to be named in topics?
Page displayed on the ibBookie start page
If on, winner will receive a PM informing them of their wager won

PM message sent to user upon winning their wager
Replaceable Macros:
1st '%s' - Number of points won (total profit + wager)
2nd '%s' - Winner picked (team/player)
setting.conf_default: You won %s Points from your bet on %s. Congratulations!

setting.conf_description:
After how many days after a game is marked as completed/paid do you want them to be deleted from your database?
0 will turn the delete task OFF!

table.name: bookie_bets
table.data: bid int(25) NOT NULL auto_increment, username varchar(50) NOT NULL, userid int(25) NOT NULL, mgroup smallint(6) NOT NULL, members_display_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, gid int(11) NOT NULL, cat_image varchar(50), home_team varchar(50) NOT NULL, home_odds decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '1.00', home_spread decimal(10,1) NOT NULL, away_team varchar(50) NOT NULL, away_odds decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '1.00', away_spread decimal(10,1) NOT NULL, amount int(15) NOT NULL, pick varchar(50) NOT NULL, start datetime NOT NULL, odds decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, payout int(25) default -2, time int(10) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bid`)

table.name: bookie_cats
table.data: id smallint(6) NOT NULL auto_increment, cat_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, cat_image varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

table.name: bookie_games
table.data: id int(25) NOT NULL auto_increment, sport varchar(50) NOT NULL, cat_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, home_team varchar(50) NOT NULL, home_odds decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '1.00', home_spread decimal(10,1) NOT NULL, away_team varchar(50) NOT NULL, away_odds decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '1.00', away_spread decimal(10,1) NOT NULL, start datetime NOT NULL, cat_image varchar(50) NOT NULL, winner varchar(50) NOT NULL, time_paid int(10) NOT NULL default '2147483647', PRIMARY KEY (`id`)

task.task_description: This task deletes any old/paid games after X number of days. Default is 30 days, to change see the DB Cleanup section of the ibBookie Settings page in ACP
